page.title: 19PLAYING FIELDS 1985
page.content: The {playing}fields are changing this year. The tennis courts, bowling green and putting green are all changing. The {tennis}courts are being re-fenced, the bowling green is having a new stand built and the putting green is being turned into a Crazy {golf}course. That's happening this year. Also the S.Y.C.C. are planting a lot of trees and they are making a B.M.X. bike {course. }On the field already they have some swings, a slide and a roundabout, a spider's web and a climbing frame. {
